main event: Observation of a UFO sighting near Robbins AFB, Georgia on November 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as a cylinder shape, the size of a Piper Cub plane, without wings or tail,The object had a silver color and emitted strobing lights,The observation lasted for 13 minutes and was conducted with 7x50 binoculars,The report concluded the object was unidentified,All confirmed witnesses were stationed at Robbins AFB.
sighted object: one cylindrical object with strobing lights
witness description: A mix of military personnel and civilians, including control tower operators and construction workers.
